definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: He flicked the ashes from his cigar.
He tapped his pipe out into the fireplace.
sentences.chinese: 他把烟斗的烟灰敲到壁炉里。

sentences.english: To cover with black dirt or soot; begrime.
Vacuums carpets & empties ashtrays and urns.
sentences.chinese: 为地毯吸尘并倒空烟灰缸及金属容器。

sentences.english: The empty tins can be made into ashtrays.
sentences.chinese: 空罐头盒可以制成烟灰缸。

sentences.english: She threw an ashtray across the room, narrowly missing my head.
sentences.chinese: 她从房间那端扔过来一只烟灰缸，差点击中我的头。

sentences.english: He stubbed out his cigarette in the ashtray.
sentences.chinese: 他在烟灰缸内捻灭了他的香烟。

sentences.english: Your cigarette ash is very long; please knock it off before it falls on the carpet.
sentences.chinese: 你的烟灰太长了，请弹掉，以免落在地毯上。

sentences.english: You can put your cigarette out in that ashtray.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在那个烟灰缸把香烟弄熄。

sentences.english: His office was a disaster area of papers and full ashtrays.
sentences.chinese: 他的办公室一片狼藉，文件成堆，烟灰满缸。

sentences.english: The room was blackened with smoke and soot.
This time he left some cigarette ash in one of our drawers.
sentences.chinese: 这一次他留下来一些烟灰在我们的橱柜上。

sentences.english: The amount of soot in the air has increased substantially in the area.
sentences.chinese: 这一地区空气中的烟灰含量正迅速增加。

sentences.english: Val flipped the ash off his cigarette.
sentences.chinese: 法尔弹掉香烟上的烟灰。

sentences.english: Joe Aguirre, wavy hair the color of cigarette ash and parted down the middle, gave them his point of view.
sentences.chinese: 乔留着一头中分的烟灰色波浪发，在给他俩面授机宜。

definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
